text:
I am a person who really cares about YOU and wants to help. I will respond to everyone who posts or messages me today by this evening. Tell me what's wrong in your life right now and we will talk it out and try to find your solution! No judgement! Stay positive and have an outstanding day!


[removed]

I'm a 19 year old Filipina girl who is witnessing these summary killings in my country ordered by the Government. AMA


So lately our President has been concentrating on eliminating the narcotics on our country and has been on his so called drug war in the Philippines. Media and people around me are saying that he is ordering his police men to gun down those drug pushers vigilante style or in our terms EJK or EXTRA JUDICIAL KILLINGS to the extent that he has killed over SEVEN THOUSAND alledged pushers since he took his position. People around me are going crazy because lately a GRADE 11 student DIED because he was accused to be a drug runner. I too have witnessed my neighbor gunned down by two men in a motor cycle in a dark corner and it's haunting me. Until now I can still hear gunshots around the corner of our street and it bothers me that people consider it normal for a day to day basis.

I have been blind all my life. Ask me anything.


Hello.

I have been blind all my life as the title says, ask me anything you wish.

AMA REQUEST: Gabe Newell- What the fuck happened to Half-Life 3?


After todays nuclear bomb was dropped on the Half-Life community by Marc Laidlaw, I'm sure everyone wants to know, what the fuck happened to Half-Life 3. This will probably be the only way Valve and Gabe will be able to redeem themselves in the eyes of the fans. Get on here and give us some answers.
I am confined to the second story of a house with 6 other families from the neighborhood. Hurricane Harvey has taken almost everything. AMA
My name is Robert E. Lee, and I was raised in the deep south. My dad is named Robert E. Lee, and I named my son Robert E. Lee. AMA
